x.description:
x
The x shift in blocks

Integer
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128

yRandom.description:
yRandom
Adds an additional amount of height randomly (translateY + rand(0 - yRandom))

Integer
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128
